hard_constraints.translation: If research was commissioned by "former education secretary Justine Greening", then Greening is a former education secretary.
hard_constraints.reasoning: The appositive "former education secretary" is part of the identification of Greening; commissioning-by-that-person entails the described role label applies.

hard_constraints.translation: "Founded by Greening" is (in this context) equivalent to "Greening set up" the Social Mobility Pledge/initiative.
hard_constraints.reasoning: Common-sense semantic equivalence: founding an initiative and setting it up refer to the same establishment act here, and the text uses both phrasings for the same entity.

hard_constraints.translation: If the study was undertaken by the Social Mobility Pledge initiative, then the Social Mobility Pledge exists/was set up.
hard_constraints.evidence: Sentence 2 (undertaken by the initiative) + Sentence 10 (set up the pledge)
hard_constraints.reasoning: An initiative undertaking a study presupposes the initiative exists; in this text, existence is anchored by Greening setting it up.

hard_constraints.translation: If the national figure (54%) is reported for rating it difficult-or-very-difficult, then the poll found a majority rated it difficult-or-very-difficult.
hard_constraints.reasoning: The 54% national figure is presented as part of the poll’s finding about the majority rating.

hard_constraints.translation: If the London figure (62%) is reported for rating it difficult-or-very-difficult, then the poll found a majority rated it difficult-or-very-difficult.
hard_constraints.reasoning: The 62% London figure is presented as a regional version of the same poll finding.

hard_constraints.translation: If the pledge encourages name-blind recruitment, then it encourages open recruitment policies.

hard_constraints.translation: If the pledge encourages contextual recruitment, then it encourages open recruitment policies.

hard_constraints.translation: If Greening intended to scrap tuition fees in favour of a graduate contribution scheme, then she intended to scrap tuition fees.
